backup_id.description: Specifies the backup ID to be synchronized.

backup_name.description: Specifies the name of the backup.

bucket_name.description: Specifies the name of the bucket where the backup is stored.

created_at.description: Specifies the timestamp when the backup was created.

image_path.description: Specifies the path of the backup image in the bucket.

region.description:
Specifies the region in which to create the resource. If omitted, the provider-level
region will be used.

resource_id.description: Specifies the ID of the resource to be backed up.

resource_name.description: Specifies the name of the resource to be backed up.

resource_type.description: Specifies the type of the resource to be backed up.
